# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur is the President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With over two decades of experience, he empowers businesses to thrive through digital transformation, innovative IoT solutions, and Industry 4.0 expertise.

Based in the Greater Chicago Area, Chris has 25+ years of experience integrating business systems into manufacturing processes. He is an expert in digital Industry 4.0 transformation, IIoT implementation, and developing custom solutions like the SHARC IoT Adapter and the DIME Software Suite.
